subject: Policy Guidelines for Installation of NHAI Logo on the Fascia of RE Wall and Boundary Wall in NHAI Projects -reg.
text: #Rah 7czv <THrf gferazrut (Tsq "Rda7 & RTHNf HART4, HRG TAR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Trzya vat 01l-5 Q 6, 8a27-10, ERW, #f fevlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TMI/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Advertisement/ 2024 Policy Circular No.4.32/ 2024 dated 13th March, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/Misc / NHAILogo/2024 (Comp. No.-243001)} Sub: Policy Guidelines for Installation of NHAI on the Fascia of RE Wall and Boundary Wall in NHAI Projects- reg: NHAI is constructing major National Highway corridors /expressways across the country that will not only transform the NH infrastructure but will significantly contribute towards the economic growth and overall development of our country: It is therefore important that these under - construction corridors carry NHAI branding, which will provide these structures with an identity and generate goodwill among the National Highway users and other stakeholders: 2 As a of National Highway construction process, numerous RE walls in all parts of India are being built, similarly NHAI is also constructing Access Control Highway/ Expressway and providing boundary wall on both sides along ROW but the name of NHAI is not reflected on most RE Walls of the structures as well as Boundary Wall on National Highways: The idea is to incorporate the NHAI on the fascia of the RE walls and Boundary Wall uniformly in all project of NHAI: 3 Incorporating the NHAI logo on the RE Walls and Boundary Walls will not have any additional cost, as it will be incidental to work: Field units will provide instruction to contractor through supervision consultant for incorporating drawing in RE panel and Boundary Wall for construction  4_ (i) The grade and thickness  of Fascia Panel with NHAI logo would be same as of   fascia concrete The outer surface of precast concrete fascia shall have form liner   finish  of design and pattern as approved by the Engineer-in-Charge. RECKLI form liner or equivalent shall be used for form liner finish and the pattern should be approved by the Engineer-in-Charge.
